titleStmt.title: A modest offer of some meet considerations tendered to the learned prolocutor, and the rest of the Assembly of Divines, met at Westminster, 1644. Concerning a form of church-government. By Jos. Hall, D.D. late Bishop of Norwich.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: re-printed and are to be sold by Tho. Basset, in St. Dunstans Church-yard in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
